Title: Enacts the "Save our New York state restaurants act"
Summary: Enacts the "Save our New York state restaurants act" authorizing a sales tax exemption for the sale of food and drink at restaurants and taverns during a specific one week period and grants certain municipalities the option to grant such limited exemption.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to enacting the "save our New York state restaurants act" and creating a limited sales tax exemption for the sale of food and drink at restaurants and taverns from state sales and compensating use taxes and granting municipalities the option to grant such limited exemption
